sourcesContent: import { MdDeleteForever } from 'react-icons/md' import { StyleSheet, SafeAreaView, View, Text } from 'react-native' const Card = ({ id, text, date, today, handleDeleteNote }) => { return ( {text} {date} . {today} handleDeleteNote(id)}> Видалити ) } const styles = StyleSheet.create({ note: { backgroundColor: '#fafafa', border: 'solid', color: '#9e5cf6', borderRadius: 25, padding: '1rem', minHeight: 260, display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', justifyContent: 'space-between', whiteSpace: 'pre-wrap', width: '80%', marginLeft: '10%', marginBottom: '0.1%', fontSize: 18, }, noteFooter: { color: '#666', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'space-between', }, centerText: { width: '94%', height: '0.5%', marginLeft: '3%', marginTop: '3%', }, center: { width: '94%', height: '25%', marginLeft: '3%', marginTop: '20%', marginBottom: '1%', }, keyFrame: { backgroundColor: '#9e5cf6', color: '#fff', marginRight: '91%', marginLeft: '-3.7%', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row', }, keyElement: { backgroundColor: '#9e5cf6', color: '#fff', borderRadius: 50, fontSize: 20, fontWeight: 600, marginLeft: -18, marginRight: 20, }, keyDot: { backgroundColor: '#9e5cf6', color: '#9e5cf6', borderRadius: 50, fontSize: 20, marginLeft: -68, marginRight: 15, }, key: { backgroundColor: '#9e5cf6', color: '#fff', marginRight: '40%', marginLeft: '42%', }, delete: { marginRight: '4%', fontSize: '22px', marginTop: '4%', fontWeight: '500', color: '#9e5cf6', } }); export default Card
